scripts.build:android: yarn setup && gomobile bind -target android -o output/SharedBackend.aar github.com/Jigsaw-Code/outline-sdk/x/examples/outline-connectivity-app/shared_backend
scripts.build:ios: yarn setup && gomobile bind -target ios,iossimulator -o output/SharedBackend.xcframework github.com/Jigsaw-Code/outline-sdk/x/examples/outline-connectivity-app/shared_backend
